creator: Harris & Ewing
medium: 1 negative : glass ; 4 x 5 in. or smaller
title: House Committee on Committees meets to consider abolishment of Navy House Committees. This is probably the first picture to be made of the House committee on Committees who met today to consider the abolishment of fifteen standing committees of the House of Representatives in the interest of the economy.
